Sehr nices Game, mit leichtem Aggressionsauslöser. Aber am stärksten ist der Funfaktor
Un Competitivo muy adictivo, muy recomendable

The game is pretty fun, recommended it to a few friends actually. Has a lot of cons though, some I would say that have prevented me and people I know from playing.

Game summary

The game has this type of concept for those looking to buy- you're in the entity's realm, four survivors are facing one killer- don't know who it is until you see them. Your health has 3 stages, you can be hooked 3 times, the 1st you just wait to be unhooked, the 2nd you have to click spacebar repeatedly as a "struggling" status, (I would suggest changing that bind to MWD), the third hook you're out. You and your friends have to complete a total of 5 gens around the match in order to get the exit gates powered. Perks.. etc can change your experience.

Cons.

Queuing times, 5-25 minute queue times when the games only last around 10-15? Not the best.

No colorblind additions, as killer you see red scratch marks and it's something that can make or break a chase, but when you're red/green colorblind you *can't* see them at all. Crippling to some players.

Unbalanced matchmaking, I'm purple/red ranked and I get paired with people anywhere from rank 1-17, unfortunate.

Toxic community, end game and pregame should be monitored more. Seen some horrible things said.

Unless you're willing to invest 500-2000 hours into this game to level up survivors/killers to get perks, this game will leave you extremely frustrated at times.

Certain killers don't play by the game. Deathslinger, The Twins, Hag, Clown, Nightmare. I'll go into further detail.


Deathslinger- He has a gun, this isn't COD. I played one game on him for the first time just to prove how dumb the killer was, fought red rank survivors and still got a 4k with no addons or perks.

The Twins- This killer promotes camping and slugging, she can go out of body into victor while staying at a hook. Victor is also a 170% speed killer who can jump over pallets, over windows- you can't do anything unless he misses. Victor can also down someone and the killer can transfer back to the other twin and have pretty much wall hacks if anyone goes near the downed player.

Hag- A killer who can place traps on the ground and unless you shine them with a flashlight or crouch, she can spam them around someone who's hooked and also- sometimes straight off the hook, it wont matter- it'll still trigger the trap and she'll teleport and tunnel you out of the game. An all around unfun killer to fight.

Clown- Clowns just bad lmao, he chases you around and throws bottles at you- the action of throwing the bottle doesn't slow him down but will hinder your ability to see and everything you do, including vaulting, running, and throwing pallets will be slower.

Nightmare- You can't see him unless you're in his terror radius, the world is automatically A LOT darker once you're in the dream state, also did I mention- your only defense, pallets, can be fake.

Overall, I do think the Dev team tries to accommodate to what their platform says- they stream and do interact with their viewers unlike a lot of game developers, but the game does need a lot of work.

Если не хватает чего-то нового для кооперативной игры - качайте и не пожалеете.
Пожалеете только потом, когда на высоких рангах от вас будут "мансовать" наглые людишки, за которыми будете бегать всю катку, а в итоге "поцелуете" им пятки и останетесь с горящии пуканом.

Но советую для игры однозначно!
